name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI note-taking & live transcript for Google Meet - Mbox AI Meet(Beta)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mbox AI helps you take notes, analyze, and capture real-time transcriptions using AI during your Google Meet calls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI note-taking & live transcript for Google Meet - Mbox AI Meet is still in Beta

Effortless Meeting Recaps with Smart Summaries for Google Meet!
Introducing MBox, the Chrome extension that uses smarts to transform your Google Meet meetings.

Here's how MBox makes meetings a breeze:

* Smart Summaries, No Eavesdropping: Our clever AI tool analyzes the live text captions in your Google Meet calls (without ever storing any audio or video) and creates easy-to-understand summaries highlighting the most important points.
* Effortless User Experience: Just install and sign in â€“ that's it! No need to mess with settings or take notes. The AI works silently in the background.
* Stay Present in the Moment: Focus on the conversation while the AI diligently captures key details from the captions, ensuring you don't miss a beat.
* Boost Team Productivity: Review clear summaries delivered straight to your email, streamlining follow-ups and keeping everyone on the same page (optional feature).

MBox is ideal for:

* Busy professionals who need a simple way to remember meeting highlights.
* Remote teams who want to bridge communication gaps without the hassle.
* Anyone who wants to get more out of their Google Meet interactions.

In version 1.5.6 we made:
* Support of Premium users
* Improved performance 
* Improved security while user on meeting
* Improved UI
* Bugfixing


Install MBox today and unlock the power of smart summaries for effortlessly productive Google Meet meetings!
